creator: DoveConviene srl
descriptionHtml:
Start saving money as 30 million ShopFully users finding all weekly promotions in one free app

Thanks to ShopFully app, you can compare prices and prepare for your shopping in your favorite and local stores, as Woolworths, Aldi, Myer, Coles and many more. In ShopFully, you can find all information including details about weekly promotions, new products and their prices, catalogues, store opening times and contacts for the main retailers and brands in your area.

✔ BROWSE & EXPLORE: find a new way to compare prices and promotions
Browse all the deals and offers near you from Woolworths, Aldi, Myer , Coles, The Reject Shop and many more. Catalogues, promotions, coupons, offers: all you need for price comparison using just one app. From now on, besides browsing a standard flyer, you can easily find single products on offer and read all the details.

✔ SEARCH & DISCOVER: find all deals in one app
If you are looking for your favourite stores like Coles or Aldi or Myer, use the "Search" function: find the best offers to save and put more money in your wallet.
With ShopFully you can compare prices and discover which one is the store with the best deals near to you.

✔ SAVE & CUSTOMISE: keep your favourite offers under control
Thanks to the shopping alert, you can stay updated about the latest products on offers and browse flyers of your interest.
When you find the offer you've been looking for, save it immediately using the "Memo" feature. The ShopFully app will warn you before the expiry date, so that you won't lose your favourite offer from retailers such as: Coles, The Reject Shop, Woolworths, or Aldi.

✔ ADD your loyalty cards
Thanks to the integration with CARDplus, you can always have all of your online cards in one wallet. Upload your Woolworths, Aldi, Myer, Coles's cards to get promotion, coupon or deal.
descriptionShort: Browse all deals in one app and start saving with the weekly offers

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have released the latest update, hope you like it!

In this version:
- Resolved some small bugs in order to improve the app's performance

Do you like ShopFully? Leave us a review, we would love to know what you think!
Do you have questions or suggestions? Write to us at info@shopfully.com.au

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
From today the Memo will become "Saved Offers". When you see an offer that you want to save, click on the heart icon: it will be saved in the "Saved Offers" that you find on the menu below. Moreover, you will need to turn on the notifications if you want to be notified when your saved offers are about to expire.

Let us know if you like this update and do not hesitate to send us your suggestions to info@shopfully.com.au

title: ShopFully: Shopping App

creator: DoveConviene srl
descriptionHtml:
On Shopfully, you’ll find deals at Walmart, Target, Kmart, Dollar Tree, Bed Bath &Beyond, Big Lots, RadioShack, Staples, Coldwater Creek and many other big-name stores!

Shopfully International Group is a leading digital platform used by over 30 million users worldwide when getting ready to go shopping in their neighborhood. The platform contains a variety of information including details about promotions, new products, shops, opening times and contacts of the main retailers and brands in each shopping category, geolocated in one place and easily accessible to users.

Shopfully is eco-friendly: it helps save trees by transforming paper ads to digital format, making it easy to flip through them when you want and where you want using your smartphone, tablet or computer without harming the environment. Don't miss out on the best offers, with Shopfully you can save them and organize your shopping. Consult your saved offers in any moment in the Memo section and always know when they are about to expire. An alert will notify you when the promotions are about to end.

Main features of app:
✔WEEKLY ADS: quickly search and browse all the weekly ads in your neighborhood
✔ DEALS: discover the best deals of the week selected by our staff
✔ MAP: use the built-in map to find the location of any store including address and phone number, then choose your preferred navigation program to get directions with one click
✔ STORE HOURS: decide where to do your shopping on Sundays and holidays thanks to always up-to-date store hours
✔ ALERTS: get notified of the latest sales and price cuts at the stores where you shop
✔ FAVORITES: save your favorite ads and deals so you can easily access them while shopping

To send us feedback or ask a question, write to info@shopfully.com
You’ll find big name retailers such as Walmart, Target, Kmart, Sears, Best Buy, Staples, Home Depot, Bed Bath & Beyond and many others. Never miss a sale!

Saving money with paperless weekly ads and catalogs is a breeze with Shopfully, making it easy to find the best deals and promotions when you shop! Save your favorite ads and catalogs with the tap of a finger and flip through them whenever you want!
descriptionShort: Save up to 50% on your shopping

title: ShopFully: Shopping App

creator: DoveConviene srl
descriptionHtml:
On Shopfully, you’ll find deals at Walmart, Target, Kmart, Dollar Tree, Bed Bath &Beyond, Big Lots, RadioShack, Staples, Coldwater Creek and many other big-name stores!

Shopfully International Group is a leading digital platform used by over 30 million users worldwide when getting ready to go shopping in their neighborhood. The platform contains a variety of information including details about promotions, new products, shops, opening times and contacts of the main retailers and brands in each shopping category, geolocated in one place and easily accessible to users.

Shopfully is eco-friendly: it helps save trees by transforming paper ads to digital format, making it easy to flip through them when you want and where you want using your smartphone, tablet or computer without harming the environment. Don't miss out on the best offers, with Shopfully you can save them and organize your shopping. Consult your saved offers in any moment in the Memo section and always know when they are about to expire. An alert will notify you when the promotions are about to end.

Main features of app:
✔WEEKLY ADS: quickly search and browse all the weekly ads in your neighborhood
✔ DEALS: discover the best deals of the week selected by our staff
✔ MAP: use the built-in map to find the location of any store including address and phone number, then choose your preferred navigation program to get directions with one click
✔ STORE HOURS: decide where to do your shopping on Sundays and holidays thanks to always up-to-date store hours
✔ ALERTS: get notified of the latest sales and price cuts at the stores where you shop
✔ FAVORITES: save your favorite ads and deals so you can easily access them while shopping

To send us feedback or ask a question, write to info@shopfully.com
You’ll find big name retailers such as Walmart, Target, Kmart, Sears, Best Buy, Staples, Home Depot, Bed Bath & Beyond and many others. Never miss a sale!

Saving money with paperless weekly ads and catalogs is a breeze with Shopfully, making it easy to find the best deals and promotions when you shop! Save your favorite ads and catalogs with the tap of a finger and flip through them whenever you want!
descriptionShort: Save up to 50% on your shopping

title: ShopFully: Shopping App

creator: DoveConviene srl
descriptionHtml:
Browse the catalogues and start saving with the best offers of the moment

ShopFully is the app to find all the best offers near you. Browse the weekly ads and find all the products on offer. Join 30 million people all over the world that useShopFully to check out promotions and find the latest offers.

✔ BROWSE & EXPLORE: find a new way to compare prices and promotions
Browse all the deals and offers near you from Woolworths, Aldi, Myer , Coles, The Reject Shop and many more. Catalogues, promotions, coupons, offers: all you need for price comparison using just one app. From now on, besides browsing a standard flyer, you can easily find single products on offer and read all the details.

✔ ORGANISE & SAVE
To organise your shopping in a faster and smarter way, Shopfully is introducing a new feature: the Savings List.
Discover the hundreds of offers published every day on Shopfully, add them to your shopping list and immediately discover the savings on your receipt.
Thanks to the new feature, you can always have an updated shopping list with you and, even before going to the store, know the total price and savings of your shopping.

✔ SEARCH & DISCOVER: find all deals in one app
If you are looking for your favourite stores like Coles or Aldi or Myer, use the "Search" function: find the best offers to save and put more money in your wallet.
With ShopFully you can compare prices and discover which one is the store with the best deals near to you.

✔ SAVE & CUSTOMISE: keep your favourite offers under control
Thanks to the shopping alert, you can stay updated about the latest products on offers and browse flyers of your interest.
When you've found the best offer, save it right away using the Saved Offers function. The ShopFully app will warn you before the expiry date, so that you won't lose your favourite offer from retailers such as: Coles, The Reject Shop, Woolworths, or Aldi.

✔ ADD your loyalty cards
Thanks to the integration with CARDplus, you can always have all of your online cards in one wallet. Upload your Woolworths, Aldi, Myer, Coles's cards to get promotion, coupon or deal.
descriptionShort: All the best offers anytime, anywhere

title: ShopFully: Shopping App

creator: DoveConviene srl
descriptionHtml:
On ShopFully, you’ll find deals at Walmart, Target, Kmart, Dollar Tree, Bed Bath &Beyond, Big Lots, RadioShack, Staples, Coldwater Creek and many other big-name stores!

ShopFully is a leading digital platform used by over 30 million users worldwide when getting ready to go shopping in their neighborhood. The platform contains a variety of information including details about promotions, new products, shops, opening times and contacts of the main retailers and brands in each shopping category, geolocated in one place and easily accessible to users.

ShopFully is eco-friendly: it helps save trees by transforming paper ads to digital format, making it easy to flip through them when you want and where you want using your smartphone, tablet or computer without harming the environment. Don't miss out on the best offers, with ShopFully you can save them and organize your shopping. Consult your saved offers in any moment in the Memo section and always know when they are about to expire. An alert will notify you when the promotions are about to end.

Main features of app:
✔WEEKLY ADS: quickly search and browse all the weekly ads in your neighborhood
✔ DEALS: discover the best deals of the week selected by our staff
✔ MAP: use the built-in map to find the location of any store including address and phone number, then choose your preferred navigation program to get directions with one click
✔ STORE HOURS: decide where to do your shopping on Sundays and holidays thanks to always up-to-date store hours
✔ ALERTS: get notified of the latest sales and price cuts at the stores where you shop
✔ FAVORITES: save your favorite ads and deals so you can easily access them while shopping

To send us feedback or ask a question, write to info@shopfully.com
You’ll find big name retailers such as Walmart, Target, Kmart, Sears, Best Buy, Staples, Home Depot, Bed Bath & Beyond and many others. Never miss a sale!

Saving money with paperless weekly ads and catalogs is a breeze with ShopFully, making it easy to find the best deals and promotions when you shop! Save your favorite ads and catalogs with the tap of a finger and flip through them whenever you want!
descriptionShort: Save up to 50% on your shopping

title: ShopFully: Shopping App

creator: ShopFully S.p.A.
descriptionHtml:
On ShopFully, you’ll find deals at Walmart, Target, Kmart, Dollar Tree, Bed Bath &Beyond, Big Lots, RadioShack, Staples, Coldwater Creek and many other big-name stores!

ShopFully is a leading digital platform used by over 30 million users worldwide when getting ready to go shopping in their neighborhood. The platform contains a variety of information including details about promotions, new products, shops, opening times and contacts of the main retailers and brands in each shopping category, geolocated in one place and easily accessible to users.

ShopFully is eco-friendly: it helps save trees by transforming paper ads to digital format, making it easy to flip through them when you want and where you want using your smartphone, tablet or computer without harming the environment. Don't miss out on the best offers, with ShopFully you can save them and organize your shopping. Consult your saved offers in any moment in the Memo section and always know when they are about to expire. An alert will notify you when the promotions are about to end.

Main features of app:
✔WEEKLY ADS: quickly search and browse all the weekly ads in your neighborhood
✔ DEALS: discover the best deals of the week selected by our staff
✔ MAP: use the built-in map to find the location of any store including address and phone number, then choose your preferred navigation program to get directions with one click
✔ STORE HOURS: decide where to do your shopping on Sundays and holidays thanks to always up-to-date store hours
✔ ALERTS: get notified of the latest sales and price cuts at the stores where you shop
✔ FAVORITES: save your favorite ads and deals so you can easily access them while shopping

To send us feedback or ask a question, write to info@shopfully.com
You’ll find big name retailers such as Walmart, Target, Kmart, Sears, Best Buy, Staples, Home Depot, Bed Bath & Beyond and many others. Never miss a sale!

Saving money with paperless weekly ads and catalogs is a breeze with ShopFully, making it easy to find the best deals and promotions when you shop! Save your favorite ads and catalogs with the tap of a finger and flip through them whenever you want!
descriptionShort: Save up to 50% on your shopping

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We released a new update and hope that you like all the new features!

In this new version we:
- Resolved some minor bugs and improved the app’s performance

Do you like ShopFully? Leave us a review! We would like to know what you think.
Have any questions or suggestions? Write us at info@shopfully.com

title: ShopFully: Shopping App

creator: ShopFully S.p.A.
descriptionHtml:
Browse the catalogues and start saving with the best offers of the moment

ShopFully is the app to find all the best offers near you. Browse the weekly ads and find all the products on offer. Join 30 million people all over the world that useShopFully to check out promotions and find the latest offers.

✔ BROWSE & EXPLORE: find a new way to compare prices and promotions
Browse all the deals and offers near you from Woolworths, Aldi, Myer , Coles, The Reject Shop and many more. Catalogues, promotions, coupons, offers: all you need for price comparison using just one app. From now on, besides browsing a standard flyer, you can easily find single products on offer and read all the details.

✔ ORGANISE & SAVE
To organise your shopping in a faster and smarter way, ShopFully is introducing a new feature: the Savings List.
Discover the hundreds of offers published every day on ShopFully, add them to your shopping list and immediately discover the savings on your receipt.
Thanks to the new feature, you can always have an updated shopping list with you and, even before going to the store, know the total price and savings of your shopping.

✔ SEARCH & DISCOVER: find all deals in one app
If you are looking for your favourite stores like Coles or Aldi or Myer, use the "Search" function: find the best offers to save and put more money in your wallet.
With ShopFully you can compare prices and discover which one is the store with the best deals near to you.

✔ SAVE & CUSTOMISE: keep your favourite offers under control
Thanks to the shopping alert, you can stay updated about the latest products on offers and browse flyers of your interest.
When you've found the best offer, save it right away using the Saved Offers function. The ShopFully app will warn you before the expiry date, so that you won't lose your favourite offer from retailers such as: Coles, The Reject Shop, Woolworths, or Aldi.

✔ ADD your loyalty cards
Thanks to the integration with CardPlus, you can always have all of your online cards in one wallet. Upload your Woolworths, Aldi, Myer, Coles's cards to get promotion, coupon or deal.
descriptionShort: All the best offers anytime, anywhere

title:
ShopFully: Shopping App
9.8.3

creator: ShopFully S.p.A.
descriptionHtml:
On ShopFully, you’ll find deals at Walmart, Target, Kmart, Dollar Tree, Bed Bath &Beyond, Big Lots, RadioShack, Staples, Coldwater Creek and many other big-name stores!

ShopFully is a leading digital platform used by over 30 million users worldwide when getting ready to go shopping in their neighborhood. The platform contains a variety of information including details about promotions, new products, shops, opening times and contacts of the main retailers and brands in each shopping category, geolocated in one place and easily accessible to users.

ShopFully is eco-friendly: it helps save trees by transforming paper ads to digital format, making it easy to flip through them when you want and where you want using your smartphone, tablet or computer without harming the environment. Don't miss out on the best offers, with ShopFully you can save them and organize your shopping. Consult your saved offers in any moment in the Memo section and always know when they are about to expire. An alert will notify you when the promotions are about to end.

Main features of app:
✔WEEKLY ADS: quickly search and browse all the weekly ads in your neighborhood
✔ DEALS: discover the best deals of the week selected by our staff
✔ MAP: use the built-in map to find the location of any store including address and phone number, then choose your preferred navigation program to get directions with one click
✔ STORE HOURS: decide where to do your shopping on Sundays and holidays thanks to always up-to-date store hours
✔ ALERTS: get notified of the latest sales and price cuts at the stores where you shop
✔ FAVORITES: save your favorite ads and deals so you can easily access them while shopping

To send us feedback or ask a question, write to info@shopfully.com
You’ll find big name retailers such as Walmart, Target, Kmart, Sears, Best Buy, Staples, Home Depot, Bed Bath & Beyond and many others. Never miss a sale!

Saving money with paperless weekly ads and catalogs is a breeze with ShopFully, making it easy to find the best deals and promotions when you shop! Save your favorite ads and catalogs with the tap of a finger and flip through them whenever you want!
descriptionShort: Save up to 50% on your shopping

Discover the hundreds of offers published every day on ShopFully, add them to your shopping list and immediately discover the savings on your receipt.
Thanks to the new feature, you can always have an updated shopping list with you and, even before going to the store, know the total price and savings of your shopping.

✔ SEARCH & DISCOVER: find all deals in one app
If you are looking for your favourite stores like Coles or Aldi or Myer, use the "Search" function: find the best offers to save and put more money in your wallet.
With ShopFully you can compare prices and discover which one is the store with the best deals near to you.

✔ SAVE & CUSTOMISE: keep your favourite offers under control
Thanks to the shopping alert, you can stay updated about the latest products on offers and browse flyers of your interest.
When you've found the best offer, save it right away using the Saved Offers function. The ShopFully app will warn you before the expiry date, so that you won't lose your favourite offer from retailers such as: Coles, The Reject Shop, Woolworths, or Aldi.

✔ ADD your loyalty cards
Thanks to the integration with CardPlus, you can always have all of your online cards in one wallet. Upload your Woolworths, Aldi, Myer, Coles's cards to get promotion, coupon or deal.
